meaningMnemonic: If the <radical>death</radical> of a <radical>woman</radical> occurs it's because she was being <kanji>reckless</kanji>. People don't just die out of nowhere! They have to have done something super crazy to cause it. Right? Yes... right.
readingMnemonic: As you watch the news about this <kanji>reckless</kanji> woman you find out that she died from <reading>mow</reading>ing (もう) her lawn. You're not sure how, but now you really believe that she had to be doing it really recklessly to die doing it.
